thread.title: Here’s the secret behind celebs sporting ‘green ribbons’ at 2015 Emmy Awards
thread.title_full: Here’s the secret behind celebs sporting ‘green ribbons’ at 2015 Emmy Awards | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Here’s the secret behind celebs sporting ‘green ribbons’ at 2015 Emmy Awards
text:
Other Articles Leonard and Penny finally man and wife on 'The Big Bang Theory' as they tie wedding knot 'No plastic' Kylie Jenner won't mind going under knife Gigi Hadid is 'complete happiness' for 'much-in-love' beau Joe Jonas Everyone must be telling you about the winners and the losers of 2015 Emmy Awards, but did anyone tell you the secret behind the ‘green ribbon’ that celebrities were donning on their outfits at the event?
The green colored ribbon that stars like Jeffrey Tambor and Gaby Hoffmann sported while making their appearance on Emmys’ red carpet was to demand climate action and disclose their support to the EPA and President Barack Obama ’s climate change plan, Us Magazine reported.
After the prestigious award ceremony, the Natural Resources Defense Council’s official Twitter account wrote “Thanks to @jeffreytambor, @OfficialJLD, Louis C.K., @IamDonCheadle and others for supporting climate action!”
This year’s green ribbons were same as last years’ ribbons, which were worn for the Green Ribbon Campaign to support discussions about mental health.
 21, 2015 2:53 pm
